ModMetaData.name: RimVibes
ModMetaData.author: Epicguru (James B)
ModMetaData.description: Adds Spotify integration into RimWorld. Allows you to control your Spotify music without leaving the game! Skip tracks, rewind, advance, and listen to the pre-built Rimworld inspired playlist. Needs Spotify Premium to work properly. Otherwise it just displays song name. Works on Windows and Linux. Mac support coming soon. This is a WIP mod. I plan to add many more features and functionality, such as sharing your playlists and having disco lights that react to your music. See the store page for all plans.
